items.content_html: Astral.js is a lightweight UI toolkit designed to empower JavaScript developers with powerful tools for building modern user interfaces. With Astral.js, you gain access to a comprehensive set of features including context and state management, event-driven architecture, and sophisticated JavaScript-powered media queries.
items.title: rabisnaqvi/Astral.js: Astral.js is a lightweight UI toolkit designed to empower JavaScript developers with powerful tools for building modern user interfaces. With Astral.js, you gain access to a comprehensive set of features including context and state management, event-driven architecture, and sophisticated JavaScript-powered media queries.

items.content_html: TaskHub - Simple To-Do List Website (HTML, CSS, and JavaScript). TaskHub is a straightforward and lightweight to-do list website developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The project focuses on providing users with a minimalistic yet efficient platform to manage their tasks and enhance productivity.

TaskHub is a straightforward and lightweight to-do list website developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The project focuses on providing users with a minimalistic yet efficient platform to manage their tasks and enhance productivity.

items.content_html: Lightweight library inspired by the Flutter framework (html.js), the Angular framework (renderer.js, css.js) and the JQuery Library (utils.js, prototype.js) which includes a set of utilities and prototypes to prevent losses of production time and to help the developers write fewer lines of code.
